QueryDataSource.Name: dtSource
QueryDataSource.Sql: select a.* from view_sfpz_all_non_sb_cost a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_all_sb_cost a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_all_ys_cost a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_mz_detail a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_tc_detail a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_yjk_detail a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_zy_detail a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_zy_tc_cost a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select * from view_sfpz_wzout a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime' union all select a.* from view_sfpz_wzin a where 1=1 and a.F50核算单位='佛山顺德爱博恩妇产医院有限公司' and a.日期 between '&dtBeginTime' and '&dtEndTime'

ReportQueryInfo.QueryFilePath: Report\新财务报表收入、物资凭证设置.xml
